comments.body: What's the issue with OSX? Feel free to ping me on the feedstock for this.

one issue is that `<endian.h>` is not in the same place on OS X (it's in `<platform/endian.h>` or something like this. 

If you want to patch librepo to work on OS X as well be my guest :) otherwise I'll try to take care of this as soon as I have a OS X machine. 

Also, I got librepo to work on Windows using clang-cl! :tada: Once the feedstock is created I'll try to integrate the necessary changes.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win or osx]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage(name, max_pin='x.x' ) }}
